original_title: Celebrity Nude Revue: The Saucy 70's Volume 2
overview: The Saucy 70's were an extraordinary period in cinema, sex and nudity in mainstream films exploded and new subgenres of films emerged. Nunsploitation, blaxploitation, grindhouse, woman-in-prison, European giallos and sex comedies, and of course, the ever-popular 'young woman's erotic journey' films that were so prevalent, took nudity in cinema to greater heights.
title: Celebrity Nude Revue: The Saucy 70's Volume 2
